title: Weinstein the Monster (with JoAnn Wypijewski)
itunes:title: Weinstein the Monster (with JoAnn Wypijewski)
description:
JoAnn Wypijewski joins Jessa to discuss the Weinstein trial and conviction, after writing about it for the Nation. We discuss how trials for sexual violence have changed rapidly over the last few years, how the media gave a misleading account of how the trial was going, and why the sexual predator has such a fairy tale-like quality in our culture.

http://jessacrispin.com

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
